ranking.description: GitNexus: The Zero-Server Code Intelligence Engine - GitNexus is a client-side knowledge graph creator that runs entirely in your browser. Drop in a GitHub repo or ZIP file, and get an interactive knowledge graph wit a built in Graph RAG Agent. Perfect for code exploration
ranking.description_ja: GitNexus: The Zero-Server Code Intelligence Engine - GitNexus is a client-side knowledge graph creator that runs entirely in your browser. Drop in a GitHub repo or ZIP file, and get an interactive knowledge graph wit a built in Graph RAG Agent. Perfect for code exploration
ranking.readme_summary: GitNexus **Building git for agent context.** Indexes any codebase into a knowledge graph ‚Äî every dependency, call chain, cluster, and execution flow ‚Äî then exposes it through smart tools so AI agents never miss code. ![npm version](https://www.npmjs.com/package/gitnexus) ![License: PolyForm Noncommercial](https://polyformproject.org/licenses/noncommercial/1.0.0/) https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/172685ba-8e54-4ea7-9ad1-e31a3398da72 > *Like DeepWiki, but deeper.* DeepWiki helps you *und...

ranking.description: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.description_ja: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.readme_summary: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code

ranking.readme_summary: Hugging Face Skills Hugging Face Skills are definitions for AI/ML tasks like dataset creation, model training, and evaluation. They are interoperable with all major coding agent tools like OpenAI Codex, Anthropic's Claude Code, Google DeepMind's Gemini CLI, and Cursor. The Skills in this repository follow the standardized format Agent Skill format
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Hugging Face Skills Hugging Face Skills are definitions for AI/ML tasks like dataset creation, model training, and evaluation. They are interoperable with all major coding agent tools like OpenAI Codex, Anthropic's Claude Code, Google DeepMind's Gemini CLI, and Cursor. The Skills in this repository follow the standardized format Agent Skill format

ranking.readme_summary: ![logo][] PowerShell Welcome to the PowerShell GitHub Community! PowerShell is a cross-platform (Windows, Linux, and macOS) automation and configuration tool/framework that works well with your existing tools and is optimized for dealing with structured data (e.g. JSON, CSV, XML, etc.), REST APIs, and object models. It includes a command-line shell, an associated scripting language, and a framework for processing cmdlets
ranking.readme_summary_ja: ![logo][] PowerShell Welcome to the PowerShell GitHub Community! PowerShell is a cross-platform (Windows, Linux, and macOS) automation and configuration tool/framework that works well with your existing tools and is optimized for dealing with structured data (e.g. JSON, CSV, XML, etc.), REST APIs, and object models. It includes a command-line shell, an associated scripting language, and a framework for processing cmdlets

ranking.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

ranking.description: A powerful Telegram bot that provides remote access to Claude Code, enabling developers to interact with their projects from anywhere with full AI assistance and session persistence.

ranking.readme_summary: Claude Code Telegram Bot ![License: MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) ![Python 3.11+](https://www.python.org/downloads/) A Telegram bot that gives you remote access to Claude Code. Chat naturally with Claude about your projects from anywhere -- no terminal commands needed. What is this? ranking.description: Build and deploy AI Agents on Cloudflare
ranking.description_ja: Build and deploy AI Agents on Cloudflare
ranking.readme_summary: Cloudflare Agents ![npm version](https://www.npmjs.com/package/agents) ![npm downloads](https://www.npmjs.com/package/agents) !npm install agents Agents are persistent, stateful execution environments for agentic workloads, powered by Cloudflare Durable Objects. Each agent has its own state, storage, and lifecycle ‚Äî with built-in support for real-time communication, scheduling, AI model calls, MCP, workflows, and more. Agents hibernate when idle and wake on demand
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Cloudflare Agents ![npm version](https://www.npmjs.com/package/agents) ![npm downloads](https://www.npmjs.com/package/agents) !npm install agents Agents are persistent, stateful execution environments for agentic workloads, powered by Cloudflare Durable Objects. Each agent has its own state, storage, and lifecycle ‚Äî with built-in support for real-time communication, scheduling, AI model calls, MCP, workflows, and more. Agents hibernate when idle and wake on demand
